lines.text: The 555 timer is an amazing chip with so many capabilities. But the capabilities it can be applied to are limited if you do not no what you are doing. In the next few steps will be all the formulas I derived from the equation given in the Datasheet.

guide.summary: The 555Timer is probably the most universal, most easy, and by far the most AWESOME integrated circuit of all time. In this tutorial, I will show you everything you need to know about that chip, and then some.
guide.title: The ultimate 555 timer tutorial
